title: Australia & company unlimited
brief_description: A commentary, expressing faith in Australia’s future, illustrated by various scenes from national life - mainly primary and secondary industries. This film was made for the Ford Motor Company of Australia.
description: A commentary, expressing faith in Australia’s future, illustrated by various scenes from national life - mainly primary and secondary industries. This film was made for the Ford Motor Company of Australia.
